rules_text:
Vigilance, reach
[i][i]Rally[/i] Skill[/i] – When this creature transforms into Virion, Archest Archer or attacks, look at the top four cards of your library. Reveal a nonland card from among them. You gain life equal to that cards mana value and put it into your hand. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.
